articles.title: Deposed Trump hurled insults at woman who said he raped her
articles.description: She initially sued Trump for defamation after he mocked her claims that he sexually assaulted her in late 1995 or early 1996 after they had a chance meeting in the department store and she agreed to help him pick out lingerie for a friend.Trump has repeatedly denied the encounter took place, calling her allegations a complete con job and saying shes not my type. No pictures
articles.content:
Questioned for a lawsuit, former President Donald Trump hurled insults and threatened to sue the columnist who accused him of raping her in a department store in the 1990s, according to excerpts of his testimony unsealed by a court on Friday.
